channel.title: Script For New Game
channel.description:
Ok, i need a script for this: tbadventure.com You can start playing at: http://tba.digitil2.co.uk/tba/go.htm OK basically i need something that can autokill magic spiders. These can be found a few maps to the right. Here are the colours anywayz: Magic Spider: 10485759, 10527138,8160396
After clicking on the magic spider a box comes up with three options, talk w/ magis spider, attack magic spider. But when you click on it the first time it is automatically on attack so it just needs to click again. The wait should be like 5 seconds in between attacks. Thanks, RsNewb *this is really easy because all i need it to do is click on the monster than click again, not much else*[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 07:02:19 PM[/size][hr]Basically all it has to do is find on of these colours: 10485759, 10527138,8160396 and click on it and click again. wait 5 seconds and repeat.

item.title: Script For New Game
item.dc:creator: @RsNewb RsNewb
item.description:
@RsNewb wrote:

Ok, i need a script for this: tbadventure.com
You can start playing at: http://tba.digitil2.co.uk/tba/go.htm
OK basically i need something that can autokill magic spiders. These can be found a few maps to the right. Here are the colours anywayz:
Magic Spider: 10485759, 10527138,8160396

After clicking on the magic spider a box comes up with three options, talk w/ magis spider, attack magic spider. But when you click on it the first time it is automatically on attack so it just needs to click again. The wait should be like 5 seconds in between attacks.
Thanks, RsNewb
this is really easy because all i need it to do is click on the monster than click again, not much else[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 07:02:19 PM[/size][hr]Basically all it has to do is find on of these colours: 10485759, 10527138,8160396
and click on it and click again. wait 5 seconds and repeat.
